mata tharangayak thiyenne indiyawa eekka witharayisarath wikramaprawina sangithagnya sarath wikrama yanu sangithaya siya aathmaya karagena dashaka hatharak pura merata guwan widuli, kasat, chithrapata saha teli natya kshethrayanta gi thanu thundahasak pamana dayada kala nirmanakaranayen jathyantharaya jaya ganimata wera daranna wu nirmana shilpiyeki.sarath wikrama layiw in konsart 25 da  sinhala, demala, ingrisi, hindi saha arabi yana bhasha pahenma swakiya gi nirmana shrawakayinta idiripath kara athi sarath me masa 25 wanida sawasa hatharata kolambaa mahajana pusthakala shrawanagaraye di siya kala diwiyata athahitha dun sahodara kalakaruwan agayime cham uthsawayak pawathwimata sarasemin sitiyi.ehidi prawina gayaka gayikawan gi gayana ‘sarath wikrama layiw in konsart’ namin prasangayak da pawathwena athara eeta samagamiwa sarath sangithawath kala gi nirmana athulath “wira sebalunta” - “muthu” saha “sulanga” yana sanyuktha thati thuna da elidakwimata niyamithawa atha.
